duties_responsibilities.duty: Design, develop, and implement new or revised processes and products for tire manufacturing.
Set and monitor various parameters for the manufacturing process and make recommendations for improvement plans.
Work with Plant Engineering to implement new programs, design changes, and running changes.
Evaluate manufacturing feasibility of new products and drive continuous improvement in safety, quality, cost, and productivity.
Develop and update process-related documentation and provide technical support for improvement and maintenance actions.
Collaborate with suppliers and Plant Engineering to purchase, design, fabricate, run off, and install equipment and raw materials.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Chemical Engineering or related discipline (Master's preferred)
